JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and ResponsibilitiesProfile and Skill Set (0-2 years) :- Build applications using ASP.NET, MVC, .NET 4.5+, WCF, C#, Entity Framework, and SQL Server database.- Work on enhancements, and bug fixes.- Strong emphasis on OOAD, and architecture designs.- Practice standard development processes leveraging agile methodologies.- Collaborate with Developers, Program Managers, Testers and Support Engineers to implement innovative technical solutions via iterative approach reducing time to delivery.- Ability to contribute in Product roadmap, Conceptualize, design, customize and deliver high highly scalable systems which handle large amount of data, would be an added advantage.- Ability to have an overall perspective at architecture level of software development, would be another added advantage.

EDUCATION.UG: BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization
